Rulings.Edison:
● This effect activates in the Damage Step, so it can never be negated by "Royal Oppression". 
Cards like "Bottomless Trap Hole" and "Torrential Tribute" can never be used in response to this Summon.
Rulings.Tengu:
● This effect activates in the Damage Step, so it can never be negated by "Royal Oppression". 
Cards like "Bottomless Trap Hole" and "Torrential Tribute" can never be used in response to this Summon.
Rulings.Goat:
●If you attack with your Shining Angel and it is destroyed by battle, you may attack with the monster Special Summoned by Shining Angel before entering MP 2.
●If your opponent controls your Shining Angel and it is destroyed by battle, you get the effect of Shining Angel NOT your opponent.
●Since the Special Summoning occurs during the Damage Step, Torrential Tribute, etc. cannot be used.

Rulings.Cat:
● If you attack with your 'Shining Angel' and it is destroyed as a result of battle, you may attack with the monster Special Summoned by 'Shining Angel' before entering Main Phase 2.
● If your opponent controls your 'Shining Angel' and it is destroyed as a result of battle, you get the effect of 'Shining Angel' NOT your opponent.
● Since the Special Summoning occurs during the Damage Step, 'Torrential Tribute', etc. can't be used.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you attack with your "Shining Angel" and it is destroyed as a result of battle, you may attack with the monster Special Summoned by "Shining Angel" before entering Main Phase 2.\n2. If your opponent controls your "Shining Angel" and it is destroyed as a result of battle, you get the effect of "Shining Angel" NOT your opponent.\n3. Since the Special Summoning occurs during the Damage Step, "Torrential Tribute", etc. cannot be used.

PSCT.Edison:
① If destroyed by battle and sent to the GY:
You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.
PSCT.Tengu:
① If destroyed by battle and sent to the GY:
You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.
